summary:
Adds festive decorations right across Skyrim. Almost every cell now has some Christmas cheer :)

Hundreds of presents can be found and if you're lucky you might find a rare candy cane staff, sword or bow to turn your enemies into snowmen!

Activate the Santas and snowmen for special festive blessings.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][img]http://i59.tinypic.com/21kcwt5.jpg[/img]

[youtube]0nWYOJw_JTE[/youtube]
[size=2](thanks to [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzDHMTg2sc_kF_amTz_NcZA]Robiehn Vidhs[/url] for the video)[/size]

Adds festive decorations right across Skyrim. Almost every cell has some Christmas bling :)

Hundreds of presents can be found and if you're lucky you might find a rare candy cane staff, sword or bow.

[size=5]Activate the Santas and snowmen for special festive blessings![/size]

[img]http://i61.tinypic.com/fw670k.jpg[/img][/size]
[size=5][img]http://i58.tinypic.com/ifohmu.jpg[/img][/size][size=5]

Merry Christmas!

[i][size=3]NB: You'll need a medium to fast PC as the meshes are high poly. [/size]
[/i]
[/size]
author: Absinthe
